title: HOUR 1- NBA Resumes Aug 28, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 1- NBA Resumes Aug 28, 2020
description:
Dan wants to know if the NBA playoffs lost some meaning or significance after players conducted a multi-day strike over social justice concerns. Also, titillating story lines 13 days from the start of the NFL season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
